Title: The Lip Reader
Plot: Jerry is smitten with a line judge at the US Open, but after he gets her attention, he finds out she is deaf. Elaine has a problem not communicating with a limo driver. George wants to use Jerry's girlfriend to read the lips of his ex-girlfriend to find out what she is saying about him. While she is reading the lips, Kramer does the translation, that gets George in more trouble. Kramer becomes a ball man at the Open, when Monica Seles returns to tennis.
GuestStars: Wayne Knight, Linda Cash, Christopher Darga, Jerry Sroka, Linda Kash, Marlee Matlin, Veralyn Jones, Dylan Haggerty, Bret Anthony
